Method Detail

readCookies

public void readCookies(Map<String,Cookie> cookies)
                 throws IOException
Reads the cookies whose name is a key in the given map. If a matching cookie is found, its value is put in the map.

Specified by:
readCookies in interface Cookies
Parameters:
cookies - The cookies map controlling the reading.
Throws:
IOException
